scripts.install:clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.pod:clean: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
scripts.ios-clean: npm run pod:clean && npm run ios
scripts.ios:debug: npm run install:clean && npm run pod:clean && npm run ios
scripts.android:debug: npm run install:clean && cd android && ./gradlew clean && npm run android
scripts.android:release:apk: npm run install:clean && npm run android:release
scripts.android:release:bundle: npm run install:clean && npm run android:bundle
